name: Swedish Property Federation
goal:
The swedish property federation is the voice of property in Sweden. With approx 15 000 members owning commercial property and/or residential buildings. Members owning residential buildings inlude public and private landlords or tenant-owner's association.

Our aim is a sustainable society. We work with topics that affect the property industry's prerequisites, above all we focus on three areas .

- A well functioning real estate & housing market
- Urban development and regional growth
- Sustainability
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Financial regulation affecting investors and property/real estate (eg AIFMD, EMIR, Solvency II, CRD/CRR, ELTIF, CMU, Sustainable finance)

Enviromnental and energy regulations that affect property owners (Governance Energy Union, EPBD, EED, RES, Level(s), Sustinable buildings, CPR, Circular economy, Drinking water directive, Waste directive etc)

Housing. Age-friendly buildings.

European semester (property taxation, rental market reform, plannig and zoning reform)

Construction 2020
